titles.title: 787 - HIRA MAMPAHERY RE (HO AO AN-TRANO TSY HO ELA)

properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Hira mampahery re no
andeha hatao,
Hody isika, tsy ho ela re,
Tsy hisy alina fa hazavana lehibe
No honenana mandrakizay.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Kely sisa re, dia hifarana e!
Ireo loza mitatao;
Dia hihaona isika izao hiaraka mandrakizay,
Ho ao an-trano tsy ho ela re!

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Mbola misy ve asa
tena mila anao?
Andeha hody isika ka vitao;
Aim-panahy vaovao no omeny ho anao
Dia ho ao an-trano
izaho sy ianao.
Kely sisa re, sns.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Lasa izao ny dia,
na dia lalan-tsarotra,
Aoka isika re hifankatia,
Hifananatra ary hifanohana,
Dia ho tonga soa tokoa arỳ.
Kely sisa re, sns.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Tsy ho ela re fitsaharan-
dehibe
Miaraka amin’i Jeso Kristy
Ravo re ny fo, feno hafaliam-be
Fa hifarana ny ady etỳ.
Kely sisa re, sns.
